metadata.title: Erowid Hydromorphone Vault : Drug Testing
metadata.description: Information about Hydromorphone and drug tests.

content:
Drug: Hydromorphone | cid: 5284570
Source: erowid | Source description: Information about Hydromorphone and drug tests.
Erowid name: hydromorphone
Category: PHARMS
Field: Testing

                    Text: 
                    New, Vintage, and Signed Blotter Art

Contribute $50 or more and get a piece of displayable blotter art. These look great framed on the wall !

Hydromorphone

Drug Testing

by Erowid

SUMMARY #

U.S. DRUG TESTING SUMMARY Hydromorphone Tested for in Standard Drug Tests ? NO Tested for in Extended Drug Tests ? NO Possible to Test for? YES Detection Period in Urine 3-4 days

TEST TYPES #

Urine Testing

Hydromorphone does not show up in the basic opiate test which is part of the standard pre-employment drug test. The opiate test tests primarily for morphine (which both codeine and heroin break down into). Hydromorphone does not break down into morphine, therefore it is not detected. As with most substances, hydromorphone is possible to test for, but this is extremely uncommon.

CAUTION & DISCLAIMER #


                    Context: 
                    This excerpt details Erowid's drug testing information for hydromorphone, including detection periods, test types, and detection likelihood in standard and extended drug tests. It is part of the larger pharmaceutical and drug testing database, providing users with specific insights on hydromorphone's detectability in urinalysis, relevant to drug policy and health research.

metadata.title: Erowid Hydromorphone Vault : Drug Testing
metadata.description: Information about Hydromorphone and drug tests.

content:
Drug: Hydromorphone | cid: 5284570
Source: erowid | Source description: Information about Hydromorphone and drug tests.
Erowid name: hydromorphone
Category: PHARMS
Field: Testing

                    Text: 
                    CAUTION & DISCLAIMER #

Erowid's drug testing information is a summary of data gathered from site visitors, journal articles, websites, and other resources. Detection periods depend on amount and frequency of use, metabolic rate, body mass, age, overall health, drug tolerance, and urine pH of each individual. Many substances that are not tested for in basic or extended urinalysis tests CAN be tested for by a laboratory willing to go to the trouble, although that is uncommon.

RELATED RESOURCES #

RELATED LINKS #

                    Context:

It is relevant within the broader document as part of the detailed drug testing information in the Pharmaceuticals vault, aiding users in understanding limitations and considerations of drug detection.
